function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Large-scale monitoring using chatbot-based systems may infringe on privacy and data security","Impact":"Potential for misuse of personal data and breach of confidentiality","Mitigation":"Implement strict data protection measures and secure data encryption","Technologies":"Data encryption, secure databases","People":"City residents, users of the chatbot","Owner":"City government, developers of the chatbot system"},{"Description":"Automatic detection of people using computer vision may lead to privacy concerns and surveillance issues","Impact":"Invasion of privacy and potential misuse of surveillance data","Mitigation":"Implement strict privacy policies and obtain consent for data collection","Technologies":"Privacy-enhancing technologies, consent management systems","People":"City residents, individuals captured on CCTV cameras","Owner":"City government, developers of the computer vision system"},{"Description":"Analysis of travel card data may pose risks to individual privacy and data security","Impact":"Potential exposure of travel patterns and personal information","Mitigation":"Implement anonymization techniques and strict data access controls","Technologies":"Data anonymization, access control mechanisms","People":"Public transport users, individuals with travel cards","Owner":"Transport authorities, developers of data analytics systems"}]}
